kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Milan's answer is the most straight forward approach but might still require a bit of technical knowledge.
Another way to connect the Refresh with the version number would be to use the [Blog search](https://community.kentico.com/blog) here on the Kentico Community Portal. There are filters on the left for the Refreshes. You can select the version number and look for the Refresh blog post for that version in the search results.
Similarly you can search for ["xperience by kentico refresh"](/blog?Query=%22xperience%20by%20kentico%20refresh%22\&SortBy=publishdate\&Page=1) (include the quotes for an exact search) and see all the blog posts for each Refresh. At the bottom of each post is a notice telling you which version it is associated with.
